explains: n. 红衣主教；基数，纯数；红衣凤头鸟；猩红，鲜红
wordGroup: cardinal point 基点；方位基点

sentences.en: In 1448, Nicholas was appointed a cardinal.
sentences.cn: 1448年，尼古拉斯被任命为红衣主教。

sentences.en: Cardinal Murphy will deliver the sermon on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 墨菲红衣主教将在周日布道。

sentences.en: His doggy pals join him with elegant cardinal and bishop costumes.
sentences.cn: 他的狗狗伙伴们和他一起穿着优雅的红衣主教和主教服装。
